Author: lyssland
Text: I spend every weekend with my boyfriend and have for almost two years. Right now I'm doing "Intermittent fasting" (which I am, but really OMAD among many other restrictions) and he gets annoyed with me for not making breakfast with him anymore but I work on Sundays now and on Saturdays I sleep in and then go to a coffee shop to do homework so he doesn't see that I'm not eating. He knows I do a 24 hour fast "once a week" as well but I'm also crazy and have gotten Botox at 25 years old and lip fillers so I don't think this phases him.
